title: MAG 153 - Love Bombing Transcript
text:
kills you? 
DAISY 
Heh. Always said I was dedicated to justice. 

The Magnus Archives – 153 – Love Bombing 
19 
 
ARCHIVIST 
(Concerned) Daisy. It’s not - you can’t think like that. 
DAISY 
John. Do you have any idea how much damage you can do if you’re a police 
officer who wants to hurt people? How much the system will protect you? 
I managed to keep most of it from Basira, but- 
ARCHIVIST 
It wasn’t you. That was the Hunt. 
DAISY 
We were the same. 
ARCHIVIST 
You’d never known anything different. 
DAISY 
Because I never wanted to. All that time trapped was good for one thing. 
Thinking. And I did a lot of it. I’ve made my choice. 
ARCHIVIST 
Okay. So what do we do when they come back? 
 

The Magnus Archives – 153 – Love Bombing 
20 
 
DAISY 
I don’t know. 
ARCHIVIST 
Come on. We’d better tell Basira. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro.]

Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial Sharealike 4.0 International 
license. 
Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J. 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as The Archivist, Ian Hayles as Trevor Herbert, 
Francesca Renée Reid as Julia Montauk and Fay Roberts as Alice ‘Daisy’ Tonner.
